sentences.english: These things could change if you learn how to manage your violence.

sentences.english: To trust my inner knowingness and take action accordingly… in personal and professional actions.

sentences.english: The desensitisation of young men to gratuitously violent sexual acts is happening.

sentences.english: School destruction is a group aggro to destroy new education.

sentences.english: His business interests span petrochemicals, textiles, transportation and electronics.
